Career Profile

Experienced Full Stack Software Engineer with a strong product focus and a proven track record in the SaaS, tech, sports, and media industries.

Skilled in full stack development, product management, strategic planning, user experience design, data analysis, and team leadership.

Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, CSS, GraphQL, APIs, Git, Jira, software testing, SQL and NoSQL databases and Agile methodologies.
